question: How do I post a donation?
answer: Go to your dashboard and click 'Post Direct Donation'. Fill in the details and submit.

question: How do I claim a donation?
answer: Visit '/me/browse', find an available donation, and click 'Claim'. Follow the instructions to confirm.

question: What’s the difference between direct and vetted donations?
answer: Direct donations are instantly visible and claimable by anyone. Vetted donations require admin approval and are for verified NGOs.

question: I need help with the platform.
answer: Describe your issue or email support@yourplatform.com. We respond within 24 hours.

question: How do I edit my profile?
answer: Go to '/me/profile', update your details in the settings, and save changes.

question: How do I sign up for an account?
answer: Click 'Sign Up' on the homepage, enter your details, and verify your email to create an account.

question: How do I sign in to my account?
answer: Click 'Sign In' on the homepage, enter your email and password, and click 'Login'.

question: How do I reset my password?
answer: On the sign-in page, click 'Forgot Password', enter your email, and follow the reset link sent.

question: How do I find my dashboard?
answer: After signing in, click 'Dashboard' in the navigation or visit '/me/dashboard'.

question: Can I edit a donation I posted?
answer: Yes, go to '/me/dashboard', find your donation under 'My Donations', and click 'Edit'.

question: How do I cancel a donation?
answer: In '/me/dashboard', find your donation in 'My Donations', select 'Cancel', and confirm.

question: How can my NGO request a donation?
answer: Go to '/me/request-donation', fill out the form, and submit. Admins will review your request.

question: How do I get my NGO verified?
answer: During sign-up, select 'NGO' and upload verification documents. Our team will review within 48 hours.

question: How do I browse available donations?
answer: Visit '/me/browse' to see direct donations. Use filters for location or type.

question: Why couldn’t I claim a donation?
answer: The donation may be claimed or expired. Try another or contact support@yourplatform.com.

question: Can I edit my NGO donation request?
answer: Yes, go to '/me/my-requests', find your request, and click 'Edit' before approval.

question: How do I cancel an NGO donation request?
answer: In '/me/my-requests', find your request, select 'Cancel', and confirm.

question: How do I view my donation history?
answer: Go to '/me/all-donations' to see your past and active donations.

question: Is it safe to use the platform?
answer: Yes, we verify NGOs and monitor donations. Confirm claimant details and report issues to support@yourplatform.com.

question: What is the purpose of the platform?
answer: We connect donors with communities and NGOs to share food, reducing waste and helping those in need.

question: Are there any fees to use the platform?
answer: No, our platform is free for all users, including donors and NGOs.

question: Can I find donations near my location?
answer: Yes, on '/me/browse', use the location filter to find donations in your area.

question: How do I get notifications for new donations?
answer: In '/me/profile', enable notifications for new donations or requests in your area.

question: How do I log out of my account?
answer: Click your profile in the navigation and select 'Log Out'.

question: How do I delete my account?
answer: Email support@yourplatform.com with your account details to request deletion.

question: How do I track the status of my donation?
answer: In '/me/dashboard', under 'My Donations', view the status (e.g., Posted, Claimed).

question: How long does it take for vetted donations to be approved?
answer: Vetted donation requests are reviewed within 48 hours. You’ll be notified once approved.

question: What types of food can I donate?
answer: Donate non-perishable or fresh food in good condition. Check guidelines on '/me/direct-donation'.

question: Why am I seeing a 'Not Found' error?
answer: The page may not exist or requires sign-in. Check the URL or sign in. Contact support@yourplatform.com if it persists.

question: How do I report a problem with a donation or user?
answer: Use the 'Report' button on the donation or user profile, or email support@yourplatform.com.

question: Can I post multiple donations at once?
answer: Currently, post donations one at a time via '/me/direct-donation'. Contact support@yourplatform.com for bulk donation assistance.

question: Can I schedule a donation pickup time?
answer: When posting a donation, add pickup time details in the description. Coordinate with the claimant directly.

question: What happens to unclaimed donations?
answer: Unclaimed donations expire after 7 days and are removed. Repost if needed via '/me/direct-donation'.

question: Can my NGO submit multiple donation requests?
answer: Yes, submit multiple requests via '/me/request-donation'. Each is reviewed separately.

question: Why was my NGO verification rejected?
answer: Check your email for rejection reasons. Resubmit documents via '/me/profile' or contact support@yourplatform.com.

question: I didn’t receive my email verification link.
answer: Check your spam folder. If not found, request a new link via the sign-up page or contact support@yourplatform.com.

question: How do I enable two-factor authentication?
answer: In '/me/profile', go to security settings and enable 2FA. Follow the prompts to set it up.

question: Can I make my profile private?
answer: In '/me/profile', adjust privacy settings to control what others see about your account.

question: Is there a limit to how many donations I can post?
answer: You can post up to 5 active donations at a time. Cancel or complete existing ones to post more.

question: Why was my account suspended?
answer: Accounts may be suspended for policy violations. Check your email or contact support@yourplatform.com for details.

question: How is my personal information protected?
answer: We use encryption and strict policies to protect your data. See our privacy policy on the homepage.

question: Is the platform accessible for screen readers?
answer: We aim for accessibility. Use screen readers with our site, and report issues to support@yourplatform.com.

question: Is there a mobile app for the platform?
answer: No mobile app yet, but our site is mobile-friendly. Access it via your browser at yourplatform.com.

question: Can I use the platform in another language?
answer: Currently, we support English only. Use browser translation tools or contact support@yourplatform.com for assistance.

question: Why is the platform loading slowly?
answer: Check your internet connection or clear your browser cache. If it persists, contact support@yourplatform.com.

question: Can I use the platform offline?
answer: The platform requires an internet connection. Save donation details offline and post when connected.

question: How can I provide feedback about the platform?
answer: Email your feedback to support@yourplatform.com or use the 'Feedback' form on the homepage.

question: What are the donation guidelines?
answer: Donate safe, edible food. Review full guidelines on '/me/direct-donation' before posting.

question: How do I contact the person claiming my donation?
answer: After a claim, use the platform’s messaging system on the donation’s page to coordinate.

question: Can I volunteer to help with the platform?
answer: We love volunteers! Email support@yourplatform.com to learn about opportunities.
